dt: {bc}to arrange for cooking by binding close the wings or legs of (a fowl)
{bc}to support, strengthen, or stiffen by or as if by a truss

et: Middle English to pack, load, bind, from Anglo-French {it}trusser, trousser{/it}, from Vulgar Latin {it}*torsare{/it}, from {it}*torsus{/it} twisted {ma}{mat|torsade|}{/ma}
shortdef: to arrange for cooking by binding close the wings or legs of (a fowl)
to support, strengthen, or stiffen by or as if by a truss
